short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: dont work alone (get support from animal pictures)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extenionsion will support you via pictures of animals. Pictures are provided by three different APIs and support animals are cats, dogs and foxes
